mapper.insert: insert into sys_data_dic (id, Dic_Name, Sort_Number, Dic_type, creater, created, modified) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dicType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select:
select dic.id, dic.Dic_Name, dic.Sort_Number, dic.Dic_type, dic.creater, dic.created, dic.modified, type.Type_Name from sys_data_dic dic LEFT JOIN sys_dic_type type on dic.Dic_type = type.Type_code where 1=1
and (dic.id = '${searchStr}' or dic.dic_name like '%${searchStr}%')
and dic.Dic_type = '${dictype}'
order by dic.Dic_type asc,dic.Sort_Number asc

select dic.id, dic.Dic_Name, dic.Sort_Number, dic.Dic_type, dic.creater, dic.created, dic.modified, type.Type_Name from sys_data_dic dic LEFT JOIN sys_dic_type type on dic.Dic_type = type.Type_code where 1=1
and (dic.id = #{searchStr} or dic.dic_name like concat(concat('%',#{searchStr}),'%'))
and dic.Dic_type = #{dictype}
order by dic.Dic_type asc,dic.Sort_Number asc
select id, dic_name text from sys_data_dic order by sort_number
select id, dic_name text from sys_data_dic where dic_type = #{code} order by sort_number
